messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]The new   Teach Your Own  book
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been thinking about this, Just got my book last weekend.   I thought,  when I ordered the book,  that this was just like the old one, but with some
messages.messageBody:
I've been thinking about this,

Just got my book last weekend. I thought, when I ordered the book, that this was just like the old one, but with some comments by Farenga. There is also some updated statistics and such; and more homeschooling resources.

I just started reading it. I'll let you all know what its like when I've gotten into it more.

I will also be able to do a good comparison of unschooling SC-style and Farenga this August. He's the keynote speaker at the Minnesota Homeschooling Conference, which happens to be two weekends after SC. I'll be going to both, so it will be interesting.

Kelli~


----- Original Message -----
From: SandraDodd@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, May 30, 2003 4:20 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Schedules and classes...



In a message dated 5/30/03 7:45:28 AM, HMSL2@... writes:

<< Pat Farenga is the author of The Beginner's Guide to Homeschooling

(Holt Associates, 1999) and Teach Your Own: The John Holt Book of

Homeschooling (Perseus, 2003). He and his wife homeschool their three

girls, ages 17, 13, and 10. Pat also published Growing Without

Schooling magazine for sixteen years. >>

He's the AUTHOR of Teach Your Own?


Well...
I thought he was the editor.

So it goes.
I'm glad I have a first edition!!

Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
